name: Dark Youtube - New Material Design Compatible
description:
A Dark Youtube Userstyle that works with the new Material Design.

This userstyle uses excerpts of both DUSKY GRAY FACEBOOK BY PIERO'NMU and "YouTube - Custom colors video progress bar" by TokHaar
additional_info:
26/04/2017 - A few fixes:
- Brought back backgrounds on header, search bar, sidebar, notification area and context menu.
- Also brought back the grey background of the progress bar - could use feedback on that one, I kinda liked it with no background but now it has the classic look.

24/04/2017 - Code cleanup.

discussions.name: FINALLY one that works with new Youtube Style
